## Dropdown.select() method

Select a specific option by index.

**Signature:**

```typescript
select(index: number): void;
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

Parameter


</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

index


</td><td>

number


</td><td>

Index of option to select.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

void

## Remarks

If a placeholder is set, passing -1 as the index will select it.
